title: HAVE WE NOT ASKED ENOUGH FOR TT TO STAY ?
body:
WELL RIOT? A FEW POSTS ASKING FOR LEGACY CURSOR NOT TO BE REMOVED AND YOU OBLIGE...

BUT EVERYDAY THERE IS 1 TO 5 POSTS ASKING FOR TWISTED TREELINE NOT TO BE REMOVED AND WE HEAR NOTHING FROM YOU?!

STOP BULLSHITTING YOUR PLAYERS... WE WONT STOP ASKING FOR TT TO STAY UNTIL YOU TELL US SOMETHING ABOUT YOUR DECISION TO REMOVE IT!

WE ASKED YOU NOT TO IGNORE TT FOR SO MANY YEARS AND WE DIDNT GET BORED... YOU THINK WE WILL GET BORED OF POSTING WHY IT'S UNFAIR AND A VERY BAD DECISION AS WELL AS THE REASONS GIVEN FOR IT'S REMOVAL TO BE RIDICULOUS?!?!?

WE WONT STOP UNTIL YOU ADRESS THIS ISSUE: WE DONT WANT TT TO BE REMOVED AND YOUR REASONS ARE NOT ENOUGH FOR THE PEOPLE WHO PLAY IT!

ALSO WHY WONT YOU ADD ALL RGM TO CUSTOM GAMES?!?!?! RIOT SERIOUSLY WAKE THE FUK UP BEFORE IT IS TOO LATE... MANY VETERAN AND DEDICATED PLAYERS WILL LEAVE YOUR GAME IF YOU REMOVE TT!!

BUT HEY AS LONG AS YOU HAVE WHALES AND TOXIC STREAMERS YOUR OK RIGHT! YOU CLEARLY DONT NEED US THE VETERAN AND DEDICATED PLAYERS...
PLENTY OF FISH AND WHALES RDY TO GET CAUGHT IN YOUR NETS!

:D RYE HOT SOCKS!

replies.body:
No, we haven't.
For TT to stay Riot would need to see a notably large portion of the playerbase ask for it.
Even if every single member of the boards community asked, that would still be a small minority the Riot wouldn't consider worth attention.
So if you want TT to stay, not only do you need to get all of boards saying it, but also tons of people on Reddit and in the Discord, and even in game.
More importantly, you need to get craptons of people to start *playing* it. More than they play Rift.

More importantly, you need to get craptons of people to start playing it. More than they play Rift.

sadly this wont change anything as they said they are looking at numbers from previous seasons and many other ridiculous reasons to make sure we can do nothing ''in game'' to change what they want to happen!

we can also say that NA numbers in general are insignificant...they probly only care about asia and europe...the rest will follow or drop who cares we dont want them just their money! and we get plenty from asia and europe so SCREW THE REST AND THEIR OPINION AND NEEDS RIGHT!

:DRYE HOT SOCKS!

It's really being removed? How will I power level now? 

Getting 2 other people together to power level is so much easier than getting 5
Sorry man, it's not staying. Same thing happened to Dominion.
